def_en: If one thing displaces another, it forces the other thing out of its place, position, or role, and then occupies that place, position, or role itself.

def_cn: 迫使…离开家园;迫使…迁徙;迫使…背井离乡
def_en: If a person or group of people is displaced, they are forced to moved away from the area where they live.
